requirement: The right to know about the personal information a business collects about them and how it is used and shared.
title: Right to Know
description: Consumers have the right to know about the personal information a business collects about them and how it is used and shared.
testing_procedures: Verify that the business provides clear and accessible information about the personal data collected and its usage.
Check if the business has a process for consumers to request information about their data.
remediation:
Ensure transparency in data collection and usage.
Implement a system to track and disclose data collection practices.
Provide consumers with a clear privacy policy outlining data usage.

requirement: The right to delete personal information collected from them (with some exceptions).
title: Right to Delete
description: Consumers have the right to delete personal information collected from them, with some exceptions.
testing_procedures: Verify that the business has a process for consumers to request deletion of their personal data.
Check if the business complies with deletion requests within the stipulated time frame.
remediation:
Implement data deletion processes.
Develop a mechanism to identify and delete consumer data upon request.
Ensure exceptions to deletion are documented and justified.

requirement: The right to opt-out of the sale or sharing of their personal information including via the GPC.
title: Right to Opt-Out
description: Consumers have the right to opt-out of the sale or sharing of their personal information.
testing_procedures: Verify that the business provides a clear opt-out mechanism for consumers.
Check if the business honors opt-out requests promptly.
remediation:
Provide opt-out options for data sharing.
Implement a user-friendly opt-out process for consumers.
Ensure that opt-out requests are processed and respected immediately.

requirement: The right to non-discrimination for exercising their CCPA rights.
title: Right to Non-Discrimination
description: Consumers have the right to non-discrimination for exercising their CCPA rights.
testing_procedures: Verify that the business does not discriminate against consumers who exercise their CCPA rights.
Check if there are policies in place to prevent discrimination.
remediation:
Ensure non-discrimination for CCPA rights.
Review and update policies to prevent discrimination against consumers exercising their rights.
Train staff on non-discrimination practices related to CCPA.

requirement: The right to correct inaccurate personal information that a business has about them.
title: Right to Correct
description: Consumers have the right to correct inaccurate personal information that a business has about them.
testing_procedures: Verify that the business provides a mechanism for consumers to request corrections to their personal data.
Check if the business processes correction requests in a timely manner.
remediation:
Implement data correction processes.
Develop a system for consumers to submit correction requests.
Ensure timely updates to consumer data upon verification.
